Photo of Texas de Brazil - Las Vegas, NV, United States. At this moment, I knew I was getting more meat than I asked for.
Photo of Texas de Brazil - Las Vegas, NV, United States. After stuffing our mouths with exotic meats.

vYMpS2UjscN1LXhSvkD6ZQ.text: I always have a great experience here at Texas De Brazil. The atmosphere is welcoming and the servers and staff are always so welcoming. Every meat is delicious and their salad bar has an ample amount to pick from. Must try the lobster bisque ! Our server, Marina, was amazing. She was so sweet and very attentive !

photos.caption: Photo of Texas de Brazil - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Lobster bisque with caprese

aRG2RRq193H4-Sin96QS1Q.text: Always good food here and I always leave feeling satisfied.  Just have to deal with a little wait since they normally are busy during dinner hours on weekends.  Other than that, great food & service.

XAj8bMRpN4LzlDNbbIOiDw.text: Be ready to spend an arm and a leg lol but trust me it will be worth every penny. Thanks to the email blast, if you buy a gift card for $100 you get an extra $25. I came here on a Sunday night but made an rsvp a week early because some of my coworkers were telling me, it's a nightmare trying to get a table the day of. Plan ahead everyone!  I love love love this restaurant. To be honest I can just come here for their lobster bisque and the cheese bread. It's so delicious. The system here is pretty simple. You have a coaster looking thing on your table. Flip it to the color GREEN and all the workers start coming to you asking you if you would like the type of meat they are serving.  They had an numerous selection of meat such as Lamb chops, chicken, filet mignon, bacon wrapped filet mignon, sausages and many more. After trying everything and your full, simply flip your card over to the color RED which indicates to stop and the workers will not offer you any more meats.  The salad bar area is pretty yummy as well. I love the salad, shrimp,  jasmine white rice, sushi & asparagus. The best part of all this is... IT'S ALL YOU CAN EAT!  I recommend this restaurant! Just be ready to eat!!!! Trust me, your going to want to taste everything "twice"

photos.caption: Photo of Texas de Brazil - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Love these guys! Annual roommate Christmas Dinner 12/20/2015
Photo of Texas de Brazil - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Even though we aren&#39;t roommates anymore, we still keep our annual Christmas dinner alive. 12/20/2015

iwbGXXKN9yRkhFHi_wrgFA.text: I've been here a couple of times and have enjoyed it very much. I took my husband here for his birthday. We were seated very fast, even a little before our reservation time. Our waiter helped us immediately. He asked if we were celebrating a special occasion and we let him know about the birthday. When he saw we were choosing a bottle of wine he gave great suggestions and let us know they had a special with 50% off a second bottle which was a great deal! They had a good range of options ranging from $35 on up, very reasonable prices.  Of course the meat was the star and fantastic as always. So many choices! All very well cooked. And the salad bar was terrific too. Definitely try the lobster bisque if it's available.  As a final nice touch the waiter offered the desserts and they do a little extra for birthdays. I chose an amazing cheesecake with chocolate on the bottom, caramel on top and they had the plate nicely decorated with happy birthday written in chocolate. This was a terrific meal and experience for a decent price. The two bottles of wine, two meals and dessert came in around $160 without tip. I've paid way more for this quality of food at other places.

photos.caption: Photo of Texas de Brazil - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Birthday cheesecake.

Evo0sdpFNdGSCgvGamuj_Q.text: Highly recommend. Don't let the price scare you away because you get everything you need and then some. Highly recommend making reservations well in advance. We've been there twice in two large groups. We've been there for lunch service and dinner service. The ambience is fantastic. The staff is extremely tentative, very professional, very educational and they ask you if there certain things that they could bring you. So you always get what you need. I love the little quiet areas that you can have your meal and if it gets too loud. The Buffy is delicious. Try the smoked mozzarella, the grilled pineapple, Augratin potatoes and the chimcira sauce. Every piece of meat beef chicken etc. was absolutely amazing.

D6KyqgRX9iIhbKWVb2viiQ.text: Terrible service ! Went for family dinner with parents and kids . We payed for 4 adults and prepare our own food for 2. 5 year old and 1 year old . At some point my mum gave a  lama ll piece from her plate to 2.5 year old just to try the taste . So at the end of our dinner we had to pay extra 5 $ for a kid , who basically didn't even eat anything .  So cheap !!!

cA5I-IrzZgPbI6IHoaZrgg.text: Good Brazilian steakhouse.   Totally worth the effort to get there.   You have to understand why you are coming here, it's for the beef and other meats.   Wow, they do it well there.     Chances are unless you have a reservation, you'll have to wait for a table, but that's ok because they have a great bar.   Was there with 3 others, and we only waited for about 20 minutes.   They have a great salad bar, but don't fill up on any of that.  Only pick a few things that you'd like to have in between rounds of meat!   The bacon wrapped filet was very good as was the sirloin.   Most everything was very good.   If you're on a low sodium diet, be careful, this places uses salt to season their beef.   It makes it taste great, but there is salt involved.     Will I be back?  Sure thing.   I'm not a vegan.   lol.

Lbmq2WIQDRYXn3TudljA-w.text: This place is fantastic! Vegan/Vegetarian friendly salad bar! The meats wouldn't stop coming! Lol

wWsSLALgArv7B9H9MclwqA.text: We came in on a Saturday night at 7:00pm with no reservation. Wait was about 30 minutes. Salad bar was very satisfying, flavorful and with plenty variety. The meat selection was ample. My personal favorite was the flank steak! Staff is very attentive to your needs. Our waiter was great! Only downfall is that fountain drinks, such as Coke, are NOT free refills and it is not stated anywhere, so when you get your check, you'll see multiple drink charges. They serve everything in wine glasses with 3/4 filled with ice. Would be back, but would definitely have to be in the mood for a lot of meat.

YvJ6nSQT1iNXXXtylTCqUg.text: This place was our go to celebrate special occasions. However, after Veterans Day experience waiting 3 1/2 hrs, from being told we will fit you in, since we checked in before our reservations, we left very disappointed. My husband is a Veteran and opted to go for the deal. We were very patient and hung out till our name was called. We even met some people who weren't Veterans, walked in, had dinner and walked out. Mind you, we are still waiting. We were finally seated after being told  3 times that they're cleaning the table and would be just a few more mins. My poor husband stood there trying to figure out what was happening, knowing I was already furious. So, ok we were seated. We told our waitress how and what we wanted. We again waited.. and waited.. for our well done lamb chops, and Pichana. We were ignored the whole night... I swear they walked past us more than 5 times... Now, I'm not recommending this place to anyone, and will stay away.. The meats are way too SALTY anyway. Better off going to a Steakhouse..

IeAoli8Y3m04UkHy1ZeigA.text: This is my go to spot when my steak cravings flare up. I love steakhouses, but sometimes a craving needs to be satisfied with excessive amounts of red meat.   My first tip is to eat here for lunch or brunch on a weekend. It's cheaper than dinner and having been here for dinner I can't find a difference in the foods offered.   The salad bar is good enough to make a meal. That is coming from a meat fan. The salad bar has much more than the average salad bar. It includes smoked salmon, assorted cheeses, several veggie salads, fruit salads, lobster bisque, and sushi. I also find it hard to resist filling up on just the salad bar.   Before the meal the server will bring out plantains, mashed potatoes, and cheddar biscuits. All of the above are delicious and yet another temptation I have to resist before the meat arrives. The plantains are my favorite!   The first time I came here I thought that the meat would be abundant, but mediocre quality. I was completely wrong. The meats are actually delicious and well seasoned. The variety should please all tastes too. They offer parmesan chicken, several cuts of steak, lamb, and sausage. The steaks are my favorite meats.   The service is very attentive. Someone is always at the table offering meat or refilling drinks. The servers are always really good about getting certain meats to the table if you have a preference. On one visit my husband ordered a cocktail that he didn't care for, nothing was wrong with the drink. Our waitress noticed he didn't drink it and insisted on taking the drink off of the bill. We never expected this or asked her to do this, but that to me is great service.  MEAT!

photos.caption: Photo of Texas de Brazil - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Brazilian Papaya Cream
Photo of Texas de Brazil - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Brazilian Cheesecake
Photo of Texas de Brazil - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Some of the salad bar goodies.

mwHDsXizN9P1w4vUg4SOFw.text: MONIQUE IS AMAZING.  Planning a wedding dinner at Texas de Brazil, which is very stressful and the manager Monique went above and beyond. She made herself available even during non business hours. She offered ideas and suggestions to make things run smoothly.  She even thought of things I wouldn't even thought of.  She made extra efforts to be sure we were happy.   I'll update my review of food and service after the event...but Monique has been fantastic thus far...

oTyHjP9rmAg4eh9KIMwj4A.text: I have taken friends there for special occasions and this place never ceases to amaze me.  Great service and great quality of meats.  Highly recommended to make a reservation.

RYr9GMRANumWDso99mPeyg.text: Best brazilian steakhouse i have ever gone to if you're in vegas this is a MUST or else youre missing out on a lot!

fQsH-VskmORyqWH5iSGV7A.text: A must visit every time you are in Vegas. One of the best bbq house. Vance made sure everything is awesome even though some of the meat were delayed. He keeps reassuring that the meats were on the way and that the delays was due to fact that we requested for well done. Thanks again Vance. Great job

fr-g39deG-Zgx3lwreA_XA.text: Came here for Friday night dinner, requested a private room for 9 people. Excellent food and service!

photos.caption: Photo of Texas de Brazil - Las Vegas, NV, United States

VWkTDcTJT4wEcB8Xrc2tbw.text: This place use to my have incredible service, it's been some what lacking. I don't mean by the servers I mean by the people bringing you the food. The server we had was great. Just the wait for the meat to come was more annoying than anything.  Our table kept getting missed most of the time. We're sitting there with empty plates and waiting for the meat to come and it would about 7 minutes for it to come and you get a bite size piece and then wait more time. It was annoying. I never once throughout the night had at least half full plate of meat. Other than that the meat was great, well season and cooked at perfect temperature. We interacted with the server 4 times in the entire time span we were there. We didn't need much from her, but a few more check ins would have been nice, she might have seen my empty place more often. All in all it was a good night, great food mediocre service. Might think twice about going there again when more places like this are opening in the valley. That night wasn't worth. Who know, maybe service will improve in the near future.

NUSqCv84oqpKC3xA_5PQAg.text: My husband is a veteran & we came to enjoy the advertised special for Veteran's day. We are a party of 4 adults & 6 month baby.  Upon arrival we were told the special was only for dinner & that we needed to read the tiny fine print to gain this knowledge. This is NOT TRUE & we showed Eva, the manager, the exact wording of the ad on our phone. Eva would not accommodate us until dinner even when we advised her that we could not come back as my daughter is a nurse & works the night shift. We are all very upset that this bad business decision & will never return. This team failed to honor their ad, our service in the Marine Corps, our family time , and our past patronage.

P74-Js1NPECja9ihFYoPSg.text: the " BEST " brrazilian bbq in vegas period :) awesome sides also :)  great staff and service

photos.caption: Photo of Texas de Brazil - Las Vegas, NV, United States

zmhC4gA3IYePYLUZ3s4WeA.text: I'm conflicted about this place. On the one hand I like the ambiance and the meat quality is good. On the other it is pricey and for what you pay the salad bar is limited and the meats you want hardly make their way to your table.   I think more than anything else, they need to focus on getting the various cuts of meat out to the entire restaurant. I understand, of course, that this can be a challenge, but I think that goes back to planning.   Stay Cheerful ;)

bGfX-KonTDOlUjDfCWK09A.text: Six reservation for eight people in a specific room which I did not get then was told that I had to be out at a specific time. Never again will I bring a party here. The snot nosed girl at front was the most unprofessional food service person I've ever seen.  This place sucks!

LYTdqZc5qHvY6sJhylCfZw.text: Wonderfully over stuffed every time we leave. The entire staff is so on top of everything, you are never wanting for anything.

h9fpulHRWE_v_C_agbaYDA.text: First visit ever to a Brazilian Steakhouse, but guaranteed not to be my last. The meats, beef, pork, chicken and lamb, are all superbly grilled and delicious. Service is fast and the waiters are very attentive to your every need. Don't like your meats medium-rare, no problem. Just tell the waiter how you like it and, voila! You get it your way! The only problem I have with these Brazilian restaurants is a tendency to over-eat, since they will continue bringing meat to your table until you say, "STOP!"   If you've never tried a Brazilian Steakhouse, GO!

A4AUeNI_gw-nyVk7EC-Atg.text: Always excellent service and quality of meats. The salad bar is nicely chilled and everything is maintained. The restaurant is clean and always busy. Reservations are definitely recommended. Lunch is usually a jalapeno cream soup and dinner the lobster bisque. Both soups are delicious. The meats are usually medium to medium rare, but you can request a different doneness and they will come back. The banana fosters cake is my favorite dessert, but their chocolate mousse cake is also delish w/o being overly sweet. Drinks are desserts are extra and definitely a little pricey.

XGY6p4HoS_O_dQMvDh8a-A.text: Hello Meat Sweats! It was my first visit & it met every expectation. It was like a Mike Tyson fight, fast & furious! I could barley take a bite out of my bacon wrapped fillet when more meat arrived. They also have bacon wrapped chicken, anything wrapped in bacon is money!!! The bartender also showed much love with the whiskey! Just when I thought I couldn't eat anymore our server brought out the dessert tray. I went with the carrot cake and that too was delicious. By the way the dessert is free if it's your birthday.

PeUXKDD8kVVk4XqZtYu_Fw.text: Hannah the server was very lacking....water not filled...the bread not replished...the food was excellent  but I think the 1st position in the middle row gets ignored... not really the meat servers issue...more position but a attentive waitress would have asked and solved...we just left

zLnC2APgGMLovT_KY_qKbw.text: Too crowded. The food was okay. The waiters and waitress are the best. But for a nice restaurant, the hostess are not caring enough. I don't just rate anything but one of the host just really pissed me off. Respect your job or don't work at all!

_Avxhcyq6cvuDcJz7Upcsg.text: What a treat this was!   It's my favorite, an ayce buffet. Everything was epic and can't wait to go back.   Located on the edge of town square, which is on Las Vegas Blvd not a far drive from the strip.   Make a reservation. You don't need to dress up major but it is a nice place and very busy. Worth the wait, the hype is real.   I got a little bit of everything naturally and was very pleased with it all. Salad bar is very good quality with lots of options I enjoyed. Salmon, grapes, olives, cheeses, cucumbers, and so much more. The house vinaigrette was so good to top it all. Lobster bisque was nice, pineapple slices were so good, loved everything.  After dishing my salad we at and found they had already brought us bread, potatoes, and bananas. Soon after several meat carvers came around. You may have to wait to get seated but when you do the food comes fast and from every angle. So much fun.   Simply flip this card over they give you and they will stop bringing meat, flip it back over when ready for more fresh meats.  This kept the meat carving service at the pace you want.   Speaking of service it was absolutely amazing teamwork the whole time. The waiter and staff really impressed me with their attention to detail. Removing plates very quick. Refills often. Once noticing that I was little worried a piece of meat was too raw,  he instantly said if any meat is too raw for your liking just don't eat it and we'll bring another cooked just right.   Impressed with the service and staff for sure and just loved the food. I'll be back very often. Thanks again to yelp friends for helping me find this place. My phone battery died but I knew this meal was going to be so epic I bought a new S9 just to get the best pictures possible. Haha. Thanks for reading and hope you enjoy your meal if you visit. Take care.

62qbleYCRrYuTwFzECRPsg.text: The place was spotless very attentive service quality of the food is definitely 5 star it's like being someone's house constantly looking out after you also very affordable you can even make reservations which makes things a whole lot easier very knowledgeable staff and very friendly kid-friendly as well

photos.caption: Photo of Texas de Brazil - Las Vegas, NV, United States. They even do special things like anniversaries and birthdays once again very friendly staff

5dnmGjA3UNWf6Ik334EAFA.text: Took my fiance here for his birthday. The restaurant closes after lunch, and reopens at 5PM for dinner.  I would highly recommend reservations as this place gets really busy.  It is comparable to the more known Fogo de Chao... but better!    The atmosphere is elegant and welcoming.  Dinner is $49.99 per person which includes all the meat you can eat, plus the salad bar.  The salad bar had scalloped potatoes, black beans, lobster bisque, salad items, fruits, cheese and salami/prosciutto, veggies just to name a few.  My eyes were so wide with the variety that I filled my plate with the salad bar.    You are given a 2 sided mini coaster.  The red side means you do not want servers offering you food.  Green is go... and boy do they come.  High quality meats on large skewers are offered to you... They even ask if you have a meat temp preference.  Some meats were the sausage, parmesean chicken, bacon wrapped chicken, filet mignon, leg of lamb, and soo many others.  We tried a bit of most.  My fav was the sausage and chicken.    Service was extremely quick during the first half hour, then slowed down a bit towards the end.  We would definitely come back.  This place comes highly recommended.

xliqqCmHbBibONeUN53wpg.text: Requested well done for my meat which I know is not common but every piece of meat I was served was undercooked to my liking. I had one piece of meat that was actually well done and it was 50/50 meat/fat. Being a cook myself I was disappointed that I was repeatedly served medium cooked meats after requesting well done. As for price it wasn't too bad given the style of restaurant but way too pricey given I didn't get what I requested. Probably won't be back in all honesty.

X2FIlV06ca-DtEZWYiKiBA.text: I love this place!!! I try to go at least twice a month with my wife n little girls. We've been here pretty much every month for the past 3 years n i've literally never had a bad dining experience. The wait can be a little long on holidays, but that is to be expected with a place as nice as this. They give a military discount which my family really appreciates and their staff is always polite and respectful. If ur in Vegas, u have to go...

k3Stmnp0xlyB3PD5W17FOg.text: Came in on Sunday noon and this place was busy. Luckily, we got seated right away, service was fast. Their salad bar has a wide variety and everything looked fresh amd appetizing. Their meat were all so delicious, my favorite was the flank steak. I had to try their chorizo and that was really good too! To top it all off, dessert was included [on weekends- lunch], and I had the creme brulee. This place really hit the spot.  It was quite expensive ($50/person) but well worth the splurge.

pxcLDfCiMaQwc_0TkyrO-w.text: I was very disappointed with my experience at the Texas de Brazil in Las Vegas. I've been to multiple Texas de Brazil's before, my favorite being the one in Fort Worth, TX, but my experience at this location was extremely subpar. When the meats came out, they were either blue rare or well done. There was no in-between. It was dry or chewy, which was very disappointing. It took about 20-25 minutes before our requested lamb chops came out, which is my favorite part! It was a Wednesday when I went, so it wasn't like it was insanely packed. Disappointed, I'll just stick to other locations.

KtOKSVwOP4N_sxP6cEZxrg.text: The meats they bring around on the swords is very tasty The salad bar by itself is fabulous and more than enough to make a meal. Sometimes you need to flash down the servers to get what you actually want. I have been too others where they have a fish too, that would be a nice option.

jrb9wAXKGwSWaGNbI4AfHw.text: Today was our 7th time visiting the Vegas location.  We love it here and make it a point to stop here every Vegas trip!

0amT-Q7h3IBQipg9YVzpBQ.text: I absolutely love this place! I go as frequently as possible. The atmosphere is perfect for a number of different events. I came here for a dinner with co-workers, my engagement dinner and soon my bachelorette party dinner. The food and service is great! The pricing is awesome and the bar staff is on point. I've never had a bad cocktail or meal here and the customer service is above and beyond. I would definitely recommend this place to just about anyone.

photos.caption: Photo of Texas de Brazil - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Me, enjoying their awesome wine selection
Photo of Texas de Brazil - Las Vegas, NV, United States. My fiancé polishing off his delicious drink.

qw3ZjDCg6sGNIA9bltHCBw.text: Let me start off by saying that the dinner and service we had here last night was outstanding!! I see why this place has so many high ratings on Yelp. My boyfriend and I have been to Texas de Brazil many times and we've always had a good experience. This time, we came in as a group of 5 and last night's service really topped it and blew us away.   The food here is absolutely delicious. They have an impressive all-you-can-eat selection of well-seasoned meats that are carved and served at table side including filet mignon, flank steak, prime rib, lamb, pork, chicken, ribs, and even shrimp. In addition, they have a salad bar and an area with hot items where you can get sides to complement your meal. They even provide cheese bread (which I love), mashed potatoes, and plantains for the table to share. Be sure to have the card turned to green on your table to let the the staff know when it's ok to come around with various meats. You can even ask your server for a particular meat and they'll promptly come back per your request. If you're too full or just want to take a little break, simply turn the card over to red. Keep in mind to save some room for something sweet because their desserts are amazing! You can't go wrong with anyone of them.   Although the food is fantastic, what really stood out the most for us was the service we received here last night. Our server, Adam, made our dining experience a wonderful one with our friends. He was genuinely nice, easy to talk to, and had a great sense of humor. He was very attentive by checking on us frequently and making sure our water glasses were always filled to the top. He even came to our table several times to see if there were any other meats that we wanted to try again. He told the servers and they promptly came with no wait at all for our request.   This place is perfect for groups or a casual date night. Whenever we dine here, we always make a reservation through open table or on their website to avoid long waits. It's super quick and easy. They also have a promo for 20% HEROES' discount off your total bill for military members/veterans, law enforcement, firefighters, nurses, EMS and teachers. As a nurse, I love and respect an establishment that recognizes these professions. It was nice that we were able to get 20% off our entire bill.  Even though the price for dinner can be a bit on the high end, it's definitely worth every penny with the fantastic service from the staff and the amazing food. We will definitely be coming back.

WVegg8pVb1W8ClYMgerF2w.text: We had previously dined here years ago and had a much better time. The prosciutto on the salad bar was dried out as if it had been sitting since lunch. The meats they brought around were good although the filet dubbed medium rare was closer to well done than medium rare. One of our party was violently ill an hour after we left. The only thing he ate that we didn't was the pork loin. In addition the woman's bathroom was filthy when we arrived and we informed the check in girl about it and it still wasn't cleaned by the time we left. We'll stick to the one in Orlando.

IO0vrKhTtQdTYaJeMVDwyg.text: Really good unlimited meats and salad bar! Me and my wife's anniversary dinner was really great, the Parmesan chicken was our favorite! The skirt steak was a little more pink than skirt should be and the mash potatoes were a little flavorless but the well season meats made up for the flavor.   They did not honor our $20 off coupon when we presented it on our first time per manager, so make sure that when you sign up for the email club you talk to the manager about honoring the $20 off coupon.  Other than that, really great place to eat! Good atmosphere.

photos.caption: Photo of Texas de Brazil - Las Vegas, NV, United States

fiitzfOLzVMBE8JeMrtQTA.text: I loved the Brazilian chorizo, BBQ, and steak. The dessert was super delicious I had the banana cream pie, my mom had the chocolate caramelized cream cheese cheesecake, and my husband had pecan pie with ice cream. We especially loved the lobster bisque at the salad bar: it was very creamy and rich.

68W7gs0ox4-poiwC62u2oQ.text: We had an excellent night here on my birthday celebration. Nice ambience, good food and good servers. Definitely we will come back with the gang!!

A5gv8930LPAL081jGws63A.text: Note: A reservation isn't needed but I highly recommend getting a reservation as this place is always packed.   My family and I had reservations here at 7:15pm on Father's Day and it was very jam packed in there. It's $50 a person and it's basically a buffet and there are servers walking around telling you what meat it is and how it's prepared (filet mignon medium rare). As you are seated each one of you are given a card which you can flip over. The green side of the card means you're ready for more meat so the servers will come to you, while the red side means you're not ready for more and so the servers won't come to you. There are also other servers that don't carve the meat but instead check up on you and will give you a new plate if they see your plate is getting messy or if you're done with it. Considering it was Father's Day I didn't expect such a great service and coordination from the workers, but they really worked as a team. I tried a majority of the meat they carved and my favorite had to be the filet mignon, but you can't go wrong with any of their meats. As for the buffet section I LOVED their mushrooms and their potato salad. However if you want to get your moneys worth don't be a fool like me and eat all the carb heavy foods like the potato salad, mashed potatoes, cheese bread, and fried bananas. They have a wide variety of alcoholic beverages but the only downside was that I ordered two Midori sours and it was about $15 which is quite expensive as I've been to other high end restaurants with Midori sours that were only a fraction of the cost. Overall this place really does deserve 5 stars because the whole restaurant works as a team, servers were very attentive even on Father's Day, and the meat and food was prepared perfectly. Definitely a great place for to go to for any holiday or an occasion like Father's Day which also happened to be my dads birthday.

_WFD5jy16P48yU8tR6YPDQ.text: Enjoyed pre-valentine dinner here with the fam last night. Very busy but it's nothing new. So glad I made the reservation in advance. Good food as usual. ktUivvk5T-efSNrcsdQ4nw.text: Steaks were all really good. Why are they serving cokes by 12,0z aluminum bottle no free refills weak. Mash potatoes were bland. Salad had some good options. One hour wait for tables get reservations just Incase.

_w61gQU32Aoqa7NFiXcGYg.text: I came by yesterday for a late Father's Day dinner. Right when I walked in I told the hostess behind the podium how many people were in my party, two adults and a baby.. I asked the lady if they have slings to put the baby carrier in and she looked at me like I'm crazy so I took that as a NO, so I asked for a bigger table so I can put my daughters carrier on two chairs she literally looked at me and asked me how many adults there will be with attitude completely ignoring my question. I was getting so annoyed and frustrated my boyfriend had to respond to her. I want to come in and eat comfortably at my table.. and I'm positive I'm not the only person who's ever came in with a baby. The young lady who walked us to our table put me on a better note and was  super kind, our waitress was awesome and the food and drinks were amazing!

NEG-FxctreAQu8PonUBx2w.text: For the price I was expecting more to be completely honest. I'll start off with the things I really liked. The salad bar is great! Lots of variety and I love all the cheeses. The bread stuffed with cheese is to die for! You can order how you'd like the meat cooked. Now for the bad. Some of the meats were incredibly salty. Some of them didnt have salt it seemed like it was hit or miss, maybe something on my plate made them salty not too sure what happened. The ribs were all fat and I wish they would have told me that. I dont know of anyone especially at my table who wanted just fat? Some of the chicken pieces were really chewy. Service really lacked, it seemed like they'd wait for ages to come back to us. Waiter was nice and quick but the guys bringing around the meat just seemed like they'd come in jolts 3 people would come then nothing. For the price of what we payed I really expected more quality.

acZUS8UHEHIN9Ht2jDKl-g.text: Meat overload.  Stick with the filet and top sirloin, they are the  tastiest cuts walking around.  Most of the other cuts are filler meats and are for the most part mediocre.   The salad bar is large and a bit haphazard in the item selection.  I did not try any of the soups as the reason you are here is MEAT!    The sides brought table side are good but again, avoid them and stick with the meats.     The place is a bit pricy at 50 bucks a person for dinner and 3 bucks for a 8 oz bottle of soda.   They have some killer looking desserts but if did this place right, you will be in a meat coma before they show you the sweets.    Not really my kind of place so I am giving it three stars.   I would rather go to a good steakhouse rather than getting small cuts delivered when you flag down a server.

3cKmlu2TVIZpEymrbYWugg.text: Another great meal. Celebrating our son's high school graduation. Service was exceptional. Food delicious as always.  Guess this was our fifth visit and each time the food and service has warranted 5 stars.

xmBs5wfadL-dRb4Wy-mcgQ.text: The service staff is wonderful, however the hostess team is very unfriendly and unapproachable. Food is great but don't bother with a reservation, it's still a forever wait.

vt6GdAtaM-AnjghN0iYLmw.text: Very disappointed, I had to complain before I saw one additional item beef ribs came out first time in the whole evening of dining. I hope they will curtail any additional items removed.

4ioPk6zIwD66IZ78WYWJpw.text: I took my boyfriend here for his birthday and it was amazing!! They are soo friendly and helpful! The food was beyond great. They do offer a lot of meats but try the lamb! The food wasn't dry and was cooked perfectly. Our waitress was very sweet and fast.  Thank you for making our dinner party great!!

7gO_xWk8wP4Wy15ofR9CZw.text: Met up with a friend here tonight that I hadn't seen in a long time.  Place was packed! Buffet style Brazilian barbecue- the lobster bisque was delicious! Most of the meats they sliced at the table were very good, especially the steaks...The cheese bread they serve at the beginning of the meal was also very tasty! Over all the food was great.  Alex our server was very professional was attentive :) Unfortunately the wine list sucked...My friend and I were both surprised and disappointed.  We sampled quite a few reds before we decided on a bottle of Cab that was just mediocre.  I have been studying wine for quite some time, taking courses at Southern Wine & Spirits, working towards my certification as a Sommelier.  This is one area that the restaurant is really lacking. But overall I would highly recommend this restaurant for a great meal and dessert. Will be back! =)

QRx42KMMURnlhTbn6fKj1Q.text: As always, great food.  The service....VERY disappointing.... The hostess who seated us must hate her job. Total lack of a personality.  Our server....remembered him from our last visit and complimented him on how awesome he was....did a total 180 this time. A TOTAL dud. (I was prepared to tip very nice due to our past experience. Too bad, you left an extra 20 in my pocket.... He ruined a special occasion...not sure if we'll ever return.  Too many great restaurants in Vegas to have another disappointing experience.

rAkQQRYakBVszkc40gHyxA.text: went on our 20th anniversary on a Friday night. We made online reservations for 5:45 but showed up at 5:00 and were seated early. The service was fantastic, ask for Amanda!!! She is just wonderful. She made sure everything was perfect. The food was amazing. The carvers just kept making the rounds with just tasty servings of meat. wow just a great experience! We dressed up but some came casual. It is pricey but so worth it and it's off the strip a bit with great parking.

fjk2_4u-YVWsAR60RCxgpQ.text: Very nice Churascaria restaurant style. I also tried the other option in town which is Fogo de Chao and I have to say that this one offers better service and the meat is slightly superior quality. They also make sure that you always served in meat.   On the down side, I will say that the choice of meat is not as wide as you should normally find in a traditional Churascaria (I visited Rio de Janeiro couple of years ago and the Churascaria are truly amazing there). Also the buffet is average but you're coming for the meat.

BBh_n0VXnJGaUnRLTmAr7A.text: First timers and cannot wait to go back again! A Brazilian steakhouse with a Texas spin... Service was extremely attentive from the hostess, our server, to the meat carvers! Recommend for going for lunch on the weekend, as non-alcoholic drinks & dessert are included in the $49.99 price! Also, if you are military, you receive 20% off your bill for a party up to 8 people! You're given a circular card, green side up means bring me more while red side up means give me a break. Being first timers, our server named Meagan did an excellent job of explaining everything so thoroughly! That alone justified a 20% tip!   The salad bar is quite extensive with 50 items. For $29.99 you can actually skip the meat and just fill up in the salad bar! But it's a steakhouse, so what's the point? Lol. It had a wide variety, including traditional salad items but also things like quinoa salad, shrimp salad, artichoke salad, mushroom salad -- basically a big range of different cold ones! Across from that, there is a warm selection of side dishes. The soup of the day was lobster bisque, which had a rich & tangy flavor. There were also potatoes au gratin, sauteed mushrooms (I got two servings of both of these! So good!), black beans, and white jasmine rice. The server also brings out a side dish of mashed potatoes, sweetened plantains and cheese filled knots of bread -- which I struggled not to fill up on! I had to keep reminding myself we were there to eat steak!   We were seated at the entrance of the kitchen so service from the men walking around with giant skewers of meat with large carving knives was amazing. If our cards were flipped up green, we were swarmed by them offering us different types ranging beef, lamb, pork, chicken, and sausage. Every single thing was seasoned & cooked to perfection... many cooked with the option of medium rare or well done. I personally did not try any of the pork/sausage, so I cannot give an opinion. I particularly did not like the chicken, as I found them to be dry. The lamb was dry as well, but extremely flavorful that I did not mind! Our personal favorites were the beef brisket (OMG, to die for! So incredibly good!), filet mignon & flank steak. Delicious!   Once we were finished, our server brought out a tray of desserts for us to choose from... but obviously we were stuffed & didn't leave room. She offered to box it up and let us take it home, which was very nice of her! We took home the double chocolate mousse & the banana foster. Both rich & perfectly sweet. And much more enjoyed since we didn't have to force ourselves to consume it before leaving. This seriously just adds to making this dining experience even better!  Will we return? Absolutely! Not a single complaint here! Five stars, nothing less. :)

photos.caption: Photo of Texas de Brazil - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Potatoes au gratin, sautéed mushrooms and an array of different meats... next to a side of mashed potatoes!

oo1oKeTYJLJH0thbs1n8og.text: Ashleigh was an amazing waitress.  She made the meal worth while.  Sweet, attentive and efficient.... thank you Ashleigh from Wisconsin.  Good luck in school!!!

wzEUYhXcxAUfAohQ8dzQ_w.text: Everything was amazing. I believe my waiter was named Anthony. He was amazing too. The salad bar was to die for and I would say order the creme brulee if you love hints of lemon.

n5nzJ3b2VdLnDbyaW2j4-g.text: Everything was fantastic! Food, service and ambiance was much better than we expected. Meats cooked to perfection! Filet Mignon and the House Special top sirloin was my favorite and many on our table loved the lamb. I was so full I didn't get to the lamb! But next time I will. We will be back every time we come back to Vegas!

McMnbms-MPHmhQe9tM1row.text: A lot of my coworkers and I made a reservation here for a goodbye party. We were promptly seated and our waiter was there quickly to fill our water glasses. Each person is given a button with a green side and a red side. Green means more food and red means stop.   The wine list leaves much to be desired. After looking at the choices I couldn't find anything remotely sweet (even a white zin would have done, I didn't need moscato or anything). I was told Pinot Grigio was the sweetest they had?!   The decor and atmosphere felt very upscale and classy.  After giving a drink order you can get up and go to the "salad bar". So this salad bar is not merely a salad bar. It had various soups, meats, cheeses, and stuff that I couldn't even guess on what it was. I stuck with a romaine lettuce salad with ranch (can't go wrong there) and some deli meat, grilled provOlone, and crackers. All of which were very fresh and tasty.   After returning to the table, the meats start coming around. And they KEEP coming around. The meats were all very good but some were chewy and less tender than I'd expect from a place like this. The filet was absolutely delicious as was the garlic sirloin!  Also at times the waiters came by so quickly that there was no way you could have stopped them for the meat if you wanted to. This became frustrating as it could be a while before that meat came around again.   For dessert I ordered the cheesecake per our waiter's recommendation and OH MY GOODNESS. It was the best cheesecake I've ever had. Definitely recommend!  Overall this was a great experience and I will be coming back on special occasions!

eVolumFp6_NJhpyEXhG5jQ.text: Not all 'All You Can Eats' are equal.. I had a small salad then devoured about 3-4 lbs of lamb(leg and chops). Both were incredible, service was excellent and price was great. Would return for sure

8suOk4G5X6oKF0sjqAwsyQ.text: It's simple this is THE PLACE to go to get meat wasted hands down the sides are a plus and of course let's not forget the lobster bisque. If you have room for dessert it is a little more dollars  to your bill but most groups end up sharing a dessert after gorging on endless cuts of beef , chicken, pork and lamb . Tell your vegan friends to stay home  wine , beer and liquor lists are very large if you're there to socialize there is a drink on the menu . I just ordered water to concentrate on the smorgasbord of rotation of meats . Did I mention meat . Okay going to stop now starting to get meat sweats thinking about it. Meat lovers rejoice you have a place.

kfOuPQouXaigZSAgiWHm7g.text: I had my birthday party there, they sent me a email coupon which is $20 off to used on my birthday. My birthday was on 6/17 and it was Father's day, they told me due to the holiday we can't use the coupon. We were so upset, it didn't make any sense and they truly didn't care about their customers, not even tried to make it right.

E1XBr44azbUOvl8HBEFTXw.text: Great food, great customer service, amazing atmosphere!!! The best restaurant in Las Vegas if you like meat! Go there and you will not be disappointed ! Also the bar and the deserts are amazing!!!

M8PO4x0xyXIMy9u4OtoObA.text: I love this place. I'm a frequent visitor. The salad bar is very decent and rich, and the meat selection is decent and nice. I just wish they would bring back the BBQ ribs, I used to love them. The way the servers treat you is exceptional. I always enjoy eating in Texas de Brazil.

Cs9rGBYI4K7rx9bjvJq8Ew.text: Come with  big appetites  to get your money's worth.  Best cuts for me were the traditional sirloin Pacanha and the Braised beef ribs, don't let this carver walk past your table.   Raise your hand it works.  First timer mistake was to try everything.  I won't make that error again.

4UC5U5bc0PtUvcEIcS4_cw.text: Salad bar is amazing and I usually get pretty full before the meats come around. I always recommend the top shelf caipirinhas too! Coconut and passion fruit are my favorite! Happy hour starts at 4:30 before dinner starts at 5.

7gyQtHj3Ryq0QA81CVDVKA.text: Food was ok. Service was very slow as far as drink refills and clearing of the plates. I ordered a coke, and they bring me an 8.5 oz bottle. I asked for a couple of refills and when we got the check it was over $10.00 for 25.5oz of coke a cola (which is equivalent to 2 cans of soda). When asking the server she said "Well it comes in the fancy little bottle." I ordered a coke not the bottle(which was thrown away). At $49.99 a person, I think they can come up with a better solution on beverages, and how to make there customers return. That was just rediculous, and I will not be returning!

Pha2-ivvXmsE1c-y441nOg.text: If you're staying on the strip, this place is definitely worth taking a cab to eat here. Food and service was perfect. The lamb chops, filet, and lobster bisque were awesome. I'll be back for sure the next Vegas trip.

GVX4UQdocrsn99ihhIphOw.text: OMG, love this place. We are like regular customers here. If we want to eat lamb chops, this would be the first place in our mind. The meats are always moist and delicious. Their fried bananas are to die for.  I am hungry just thinking about it. Lol

XLSkiIunG_V-YEAslzUwFw.text: A great place for the carnivore!  They never miss on service or food quality! Great place to take friends!

RFK3F0flgO-kqENFaRAAMw.text: First Brazilian restaurant I visited in Las Vegas and it was an awesome experience! I celebrated my birthday here during dinner service on July 23. Of all the restaurants I've dine in Las Vegas this restaurant offers the best service! I can't count how many times our server refilled our glass and asked us how we were doing and if we had any other requests. Good job to the blonde lady server (sorry I forgot your name)! The meat here are out of this world! I highly recommend their filet mignon. Salad bar had a great selection and it tasted awesome! I left the restaurant beyond satisfied!

photos.caption: Photo of Texas de Brazil - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Appetizer/ salad/ buffet.

TUjec30irh_vyYQPI55prg.text: This is a protein lovers paradise. I reserved a table on trip advisor for a party of three, on a Tuesday night at 9 pm. The restaurant had a few people, but it wasn't overcrowded or noisy. The atmosphere was cozy and romantic. This wasn't a romantic occasion, but it had potential if that was what you were looking for. We started with the salad bar that had so many delicious choices that it could have been my dinner, but I had prepared for this experience, so I saved room for the MEAT. There were so many different kinds of protein that were brought to our table, I couldn't name all of them. I tried at least 6 different choices, if not more. The filet mignon was my favorite. The service was spot on. The dinner was $49.99 per person, not including drinks. I thought this was pretty reasonable for fine dining and the amount of food that was included. I would definitely visit this establishment again in the future.

WBTsjYZo6axLLTyQtLRtHw.text: I had an exceptional experience today!! We're repeat customers, and the service has always been great. Today I was totally impressed-  our server Miguel provided extremely attentive service!! The meat was coming almost faster than we could keep up with. Excellent array of meats- the lamb was over the top. We will definitely be back! Ask to be seated in Miguel's section- he is stellar!!

ZxxOd09JAjKzhOjVskDm-A.text: Perhaps the best value in Las Vegas. Everyone at this place bends over backyards to make you happy, and the food is out of this world. Check the bar for Brazilian inspired coctails, but I would recommend either Lyft or Uber later on in the evening. All good!

eSvknOdARX89G8mFgBA2Gw.text: What an amazing experience!!!  Every single item on the menu is out of this world good! The service was friendly and fast. The salad bar was surprisingly amazing as well!  I can't wait to come back with more friends and family.

vOvqETH0s3WcgPsxl07zPQ.text: Via Brasil Steakhouse has this place beat, by far, in my opinion! I can't say I enjoyed anything. They claim to have 15 different meats and I experienced 8. They have a bigger salad bar but that's it. It took forever to get meat and when they brought it by they piled it on my plate. By the time I ate one cut the othe cuts were cold. When I asked for one cut at a time they took forever to come back by. I guess they could blame it on the crowd but it really was due to being under staffed. All in all they did not make my favorites list and I'll probably never eat here again. $200 later and I'm still hungry. Hype?

puHfOlCyAWYGAkrSke706w.text: This place has lost my business, ordered take out and they didn't even have my order when I showed up #poorcustomerservice

TxG6_IwLIk-cyxasV8TYfg.text: I can't even express how much I enjoyed it here. The service is stellar, the salad bar amazing! Omg the meats are beyond awesome. I could come here every night! Best meal ever!

photos.caption: Photo of Texas de Brazil - Las Vegas, NV, United States. This is just from the salad bar!
Photo of Texas de Brazil - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Abundance of meats and amazing side dishes
Photo of Texas de Brazil - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Coconut cream pie. Two words: love love

NwGVCwCHE5AAWOQ_4bCQzw.text: My five stars goes to our Awesome Waiter/Server CARLOS S ...... And yes we remembered his name because people like him, you never forget!! Made our first experience one to remember. He was very attentive! The restaurant has a wide selection of meats and salad bar with other sides (rice, mushrooms, potatoes) When coming here make sure to pace yourself in order to be able to appreciate all the food the restaurant has to offer.

Qt9i7lcB4qQnS28vgNdI3w.text: A little disappointing. Very similar to Fogo which I have gone to on a lot of occasions. The biggest difference for me is the bananas. Here they are not edible vs being my favorite thing at Fogo. Still good just not as good. Will not be back.

Mvu2gda3iG5hveHbFS9y4Q.text: MISLEADING OFFER VIA PROMOTIONAL E-MAIL  An e-mail offer to receive a $150.00 dinner certificate mentions nothing about a minimum spend of $1500.00.  It clearly states you earn a $150 gift certificate for bringing at least 15 guests before a certain expiration date.  All criteria/terms were completely met.  When I signed the contract and paid my deposit, I observed the agreement states you earn a $50 gift certificate for each $500 spent. I pointed this out to the manager; he denied knowing what the promotional e-mail stated and could only go by the one-page contract.  The contract states your gift certificate will be mailed on the Monday following your event.  Not so.  Mine was mailed 22 days later than committed.  I'm going to enjoy my $100 gift certificate because I only spent $1200.00 that evening.  In fairness, I must say the food and especially the service was excellent!

eShLGUrWDlBSYem5WPuyvg.text: 10.21.16 This is without question was one of the greatest restaurant experiences I've ever had. Nothing but positive things to say about this place. Had the most amazing cocktails and bar service while we waited waited to be seated - Thank you D! Dinner was was phenomenal! Our server was on point with everything, made our dinner experience 10 times better - Thank you Adam for making AG's birthday a special one.

kIED0vx-nCX7p55BbTNejA.text: Been here once before and then recently went for dinner and I enjoyed everything I got. The wait for dinner was about an hour but it wasn't a big deal so just walked around town square for a bit to kill time. So if your in a rush make reservations. I love the salad bar and I think that was the best part for me. So many choices including soups like the lobster bisque which is a must try, olives, cheeses, cured meats, mushrooms and so much more. The meat choices were endless and I loved the top sirloin and everything that was bacon wrapped! Try everything that comes around even if you think your full. The service was good and the server even got us the bananas with condensed milk which wasn't on the menu and it was addicting. The bread with the cheese is also a must try but try not to get full on that.

KCytFl5GifWRGxMpX1o_BQ.text: If you like meats ,then this is the place to go all the meats were well seasoned and cooked fresh they also have huge salad bar with alot of veggies and fresh dressings,service was prompt and attentive as well, nice classy casual environment, will be back

O_9ixfk5WmIJ4XFL5Buvig.text: Meat. You will explode from the meat. The staff remembered my preferences and were outgoing. My mom was in a terrible mood and they managed to cheer her up, please tip accordingly when dining with grumpy people.

cbz5f7rlcuKlT-BWLr8AMA.text: First time there.  Everything was awesome from start to finish.  Great choice at the salad bar and an assortment of meats to choose from... all seasoned and prepared very well.  Adam was our waiter... he was excellent... the place hummed.  Will definitely go back!

fB0zvG6JDqiKa_ojUztr0Q.text: this is the best steakhouse i've been too. took my brothers to eat there awesome. it's a buffet instead of you go and get your own food your food comes to you..... the lamb chops was my favorite but the meats so ono..... think i'll go there to eat every time i go to vegas....

dU-4h3ZNWIEkNqLKirXYIw.text: Everything we had from salad, soup and of course the meats (superior quality),dessert are the best of the best. the house made formula lemonade is a bomb. and the best part is, Alex, our server probably the most excellent guy we had. He is very attentive and really took care of us. I recommend Alex for a higher position coz, he is so knowledgeable for everything about what to expect from the menu. He made our anniversary very fulfilling. we will definitely recommend this place and will keep on coming back with friends and relatives.

TQ7fAM-xtSFB25cSXwvXiw.text: Probably my 5th time here.. wait was a a while but that's okay don't mind ... the food was delicious the crowd was a lot though I guess because the food is good I suggest you make reservations or you will be waiting on top of one another

pR-JGKf96tilsEgHMNUx0g.text: I love this place!!  Any place that has prosciutto and grana padano cheese at their salad bar gets my heart.  Who doesn't love some cured meats and cheeses to start off a meal?  The lobster bisque is to die for.  there are so many items at the salad bar that I can't even begin to name them all, just know that the salad bar is excellent.    Now on to the meats!!  Filet mignon is tender and juicy, everything you imagine it to be.  Braised beef ribs are one of my favorite items here.  They are wonderfully flavorful, basting in its own juices.  Lamb chops are wonderful, tender, and juicy.  Barzilian sausage has a little bit of kick and great flavor.  Flank steak was another winner.  And the house special sirloin is definitely the star of the show.  That layer of fat bordering the succulent meat provides the perfect amount of flavor to the sirloin.  My mouth is watering just thinking about it.  The meat coma is totally worth it!!!

VbNvie-1hjxHMKUY_Ywzkw.text: It definitely was an experience. I think Hawaii peeps should try this at least once. Lots and lots of meats. So much that I got exhausted eating meat if possible. I kept on trying but I finally had to tap out. Worth the money? Not really but to say I did it was what I wanted to accomplish. BOOOM!

N33VO9ueXoyow_Ze7RTP1w.text: The food was delicious! So much to choose from! The salad bar was very fresh. Honestly though if is wasn't for MARINA I think my wife and I would have been less impressed. Service is great she took care of us!   Plenty of parking and casual attire.

06hfL0SymIn-Y6qRayyk9A.text: I'm a fan of the food not a fan of the price!  Honestly, I could NEVER eat $50 plus dollars of a meal!! What I do like about restaurants like this one is the options.  I'm a picker.  I like to pick at different things but picking is costly! Haha.  Side dishes are good and I liked the selection.  Much better than Fogo where it's mostly just a salad bar.   My friends and I had dinner here this past Saturday night while in Vegas celebrating my birthday.  12 of us.  Service was good, ambiance was nice, food was good.    I've been to many Brazilian places and this is one of my better experience.  Would I come here again? Sure, if I want to blow 100 bucks.

photos.caption: Photo of Texas de Brazil - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Texas de Brazil - Las Vegas, NV, United States. My dinner party

dZ9hMa7BHps5wtLgACBIuQ.text: Wonderful food,  excellent server!  Very nice place! Lobster bisque was very good, soooo much food!

MlCh-rlHeVaDB05Ai-kj_Q.text: This place deserves 100% on food and customer service. The food was out of this world. They offer an arrangement of meats brought to your table...each one better than the next. I  Filet Mignon and Sausage. They also have a hot and cold food bar mixed with all types of goodness. They also bring plantains, mashed potatos & bread to your table to accompany your meal all included and their price plus my four-year-old daughter was only $5 extra for her meal you cannot beat that.

6OtuwZGnWsyhophLbthY4A.text: I LOVE this Salad Bar!!! Hubby goes for the meat, I go for all the delicious HOT and COLD unique items on the Salad bar... totally satisfied and SO filling!!! Absolutely the best chimmichurri ever!!! Could put it on everything!!! Yum!!

zLeGfBXVNARLXhW1lbOhbg.text: This place is awesome. Classic Brazilian style, all you can eat BBQ, prime quality meat sliced to order at  the table. The salad bar is awesome as well, but save the salad until you've had some of the awesome meat.

o-FXuueWEtmLnyhnNCKbLA.text: Food: excellent Service: excellent Value: a bit pricey, but most things in Vegas are. Recommend to a friend? Absolutely!  BUT, the TAMPA location has terrible service. We won't go back there.

CyRCgPe6HIxzxVvLF-lDeQ.text: You need to prepare yourself before having dinner here, you need a big appetite for sure! They have an amazing 50-item salad bar which has the most amazing and buttery lobster bisque soup! Definitely recommend dipping the house cheese bread balls into the soup. Your meal also comes with mashed potatoes and a cinnamon sugar plantain to cleanse the palette in between courses.  Our favorites were the bacon wrapped chicken, chicken wings, and sausages!  For dessert, we had the orange/sugar creme brulee and Brazilian cheesecake which is a fudge/caramel cheesecake.

photos.caption: Photo of Texas de Brazil - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Texas de Brazil - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Creme brûlée + Brazilian cheesecake
Photo of Texas de Brazil - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Salad Bar: Sushi, Caesar Salad w/bacon, Brazilian sausage links, bacon wrapped chicken &amp; grape salad

UuVaVmgoaM5LQmwT0vc6pw.text: Wonderful food although pricey. The meats were cooked to perfection. The salad bar was awesome, so many delicious items. The Brazilian cheesecake was so tasty and the presentation was exceptional.

dFx8ekMlOM3YIdFnTIpiVg.text: First off I was very satisfied with my dinner( party of 7)but unfortunately for my mom and cousin weren't able to enjoy the satisfaction that I did. They basically paid $50 each for a open salad bar every time they had asked for well done they kept getting told that they'd be right back. 2 hours in and 3 plates of grape salad later still no meat for them. Our waitress was very attentive for as much as she can do in her position but unfortunately it wasn't enough to save their dinner.

HDwDPDvwTMZ5Kf8nhD6LQw.text: Picanha, lamb chops, top sirloin and flank kept coming in at a great speed. Fernando was great. Andre, one of the managers, was superb as well.  We come every once in a while, since we live far from the Strip, but this place does not disappoint when we make the trip.

BxxhvtD5a12_x4K4fQhgNg.text: A clean salad bar with lots of selections. A variety of churrascos to choose from, some a bit salty. The interior was nicely designed and decorated, comparable to the upscale restaurants on the strip. The sangria was delicious! Great for big parties.

DMiMBTyGSfmY3G0VZ854pA.text: First timers!  We should have listened to the server. He mentioned to not eat too much in the salad bar.  Well we got so excited that we HAD to try everything. Flipped the card to GREEN and all the meats came one after the other. Remember don't forget to turn your card to RED! Which I did and let me tell you, we were stuffed at the end of the night. Finished the night up with Brazilian Cheesecake. It was delicious! I would have enjoyed it more if I wasn't so full. Food coma coming along.   Lesson of the day:  LISTEN to your server. They know it best!  Our server was Wesley. He was fantastic. He always asked if we were doing okay, if we needed anything, if there was a particular meat we wanted, and fixed our napkins. He was nice to have a server. We hope to be served by him again in the future. Thank you Wesley for making our first time in Texas De Brazil an awesome experience.

photos.caption: Photo of Texas de Brazil - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Keep the meat coming.
Photo of Texas de Brazil - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Don&#39;t forget to turn your card to this!
Photo of Texas de Brazil - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Delicious tea!

F3mwzf9146a2IjFh3dBCmQ.text: Food was great, but the service was amazing. Vance was the best server we've ever had here! His personality makes dinner even more entertaining.  Move over Fogo ... We may have a new favorite for Churrasco!

OgQlgzb1ZjvIwAkPvrIgUQ.text: I went here on Tuesday night, first time.  I mean it was ok, not the best restaurant I have visited , I didn't like that fact I had to get up and serve myself like a buffet for 50 dollars a head I would have appreciated  my food being served to me but other than that it was good,  The meat was very tender and the lobster bisque soup, absolutely wonderful. Its not on my list to return but hey you never know :)

hwCiLnVY-3guxmC6f2D8pA.text: I have been to quite a few Texas de Brazil's and this one has been the one I've enjoyed the least. It seemed like all of the meats that they brought out were terribly cooked and not as tender and juicy as other locations. The service was average too! We waited quite a while to be presented with more meats and when they did come out it was the meat we've already had. For the amount you pay for a meal at this restaurant, you would think the service would be better. I don't think we'll be visiting this location again!

rCFw0z4bJuPxKsmaYtcbmg.text: This was a great night.  Delicious food, great service, great atmosphere.  I took my university student athlete and roommate for dinner.  These kids can eat, and they were in heaven with all the protein you can eat.  They loved the huge cheesecake as well.  Good for special ocassion, business dinner or just night our when you are hungry.  I'll  be back

kDhCoNhf6z1IBr2qlpt6uw.text: AMAZING!!! Salad bar, rodizio meat selections, service, ambiance just everything is wonderful here! We love coming here for special occasions or if we're craving really good rodizio meat. Reservations are recommended especially on weekends. It definitely gets busy here since they are located minutes from the the strip. Great place for tourist and locals. Again... AMAZING food!!! GO HERE! :)

photos.caption: Photo of Texas de Brazil - Las Vegas, NV, United States

PIdo5ClWaPq2IWWUczHs6g.text: 50$ round-trip cab fare from where we stayed. Salad bar was 24.99 and excellent and all you can eat. As far as the meats, Pampas in Planet Hollywood mall way better, closer, and more selections of meats. I had very very odd bland meat, from ribs to lamb. Or very salty. The best and consistent was the flank, London broil and their sirloin. 121.00 plus 59$ cab fees was the dinner night

VuezxwzUsHvwLuURqEbl9g.text: One of my favorite places to dine in Vegas and favorite cuisines that makes sure you don't leave hungry!  I've been here many times and tried many Brazilian rodizio steakhouses in Vegas and Texas De Brazil ranks near the top.  Great salad bar selection which stays consistent for the most part as I always tend to chose the same sides but not too much since I'm all about the different meats they serve.  The meats are all flavorful and juicy but definitely require many glasses of water due to the salt element of cooking.  Must haves include the picanha, filet mignon, garlic steak, sausage, flank steak and beef ribs served only at dinner and cut from the slab which melts like butter to the cut.  Service is usually pretty good but I did run into one night of mediocre service where I had to tell the server a few times for one type of meat and it still never showed up so I just gave up and was too full anyways.  Place gets very busy so reservations highly recommended or go around 9 pm since they close at 10 pm.  Desserts are a must if you have room after the meal.

photos.caption: Photo of Texas de Brazil - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Meat!

Ds_C2_U5tQhlUnkR2Sd3iw.text: Fantastic! Went there today for a business lunch meeting. Service and food was five stars!! Definitely would recommend this place to everyone. Great job!!!

RktmqWKDOwvSrYgtqQZOVg.text: Food was great service wasn't. I had the green side of my card facing up to be serviced more food. Twice in a row my husband was serviced but not me.

WLBDh6VRg9eJ0-xup5U9Aw.text: Love this place. The filet and bacon is always phenomenal. The flank, top sirloin, and beef rib were also on point last night! Every person/guest I bring here always leaves with a smile and waddles out the door (meat drunk). Service is always great too. Although last night there were no hearts of palm, which is one of my favorites. I hope they didn't stop serving it.

7qKIStpv3Sr7f8VwaPwWkw.text: This location is the worst I have been to! Messed up my reservation time! Then the customer service is very blah...no personality and some workers look very confused of their surroundings lets hope the food will offset the horrible beginning.  I will update this post for now it get 1 star!

4P8PxF6o_QLCVcIOwIeeeA.text: We came here to celebrate our one year engagement anniversary and even though it was a little pricey it was worth every penny!  Since it was a Monday there wasn't much of a wait.  By the time I returned from using the restroom our table was ready.  I didn't particularly like the seating as it was right behind the host station but for being seated that quickly (and being very hungry) I let it slide.  Next time I'll ask for a seat in the back. The only real negative I have us that the entry/exit doors are extremely heavy.  If that's the worst thing about a place in my book that's easily 5 stars.    We started out with the salad bar and a few of my favorite things were the goat cheese,  green beans and au gratin potatoes.  I also really enjoyed the potato salad which is not something I'm usually fond of.    The meats!  Oh the meats!  I tried chicken wrapped in bacon,  chicken parmesian, filet wrapped in bacon,  sirloin steak,  flank steak and sausage.  Everything was delicious.  The sausage has a slight kick to it which was a nice change of pace. The filet wrapped in bacon was a little on the salty side but that didn't stop me from finishing it.  The flank steak and sirloin steak were melt in your mouth delicious.  The chicken options were good but I'm more of a red meat person so they don't really stand out as I'm writing this.   We were stuffed full and asking for the check when our server Sue gave us comment cards and mentioned future discounts (of course we took the bait). I found this practice slightly odd for what seemed to be an upscale place.  I asked if we were able to get any discounts this time because we were celebrating our engagement anniversary and she offered us the cheesecake and even wrapped it to go for us.  The service was excellent,  the food was excellent because of the price this would be more of a special occasion restaurant but I do see us going back.

7zkdXbSYRzhnSWIjT9W4Ag.text: Lauren was our server and we had a party of six including a two-year-old. She was nice and cordial but we had three birthdays and she charged us for two of the birthday desserts. How come a high-priced restaurant like this be so cheap. I saw they charged $49.99 for the baby and I had her take that off. She eats next to nothing and the two females only eat chicken and salad. It's still one of my favorite places to dine but they nickel and dime you.

TgXm-VDh6F9YnDNG578SIQ.text: Went I a whim with my boyfriend because our other plans had fell thru and it was a blessing in disguise. Can in on a Friday night at about 8 and got seated in 30 minutes and it's well worth the wait. Michelle was our waiter and was great. He answered all questions and accompanied us however he could. There were 12 meats and all were delicious. The prim rib was the best but all were tasty. Coming in you know it's expensive but it felt like it was worth it because we were stuffed and I had nothing to complain about.

ekhR-d_B4FLNiE4TU-w7CA.text: the location has this place busy . but honest although I've been a few times, I'm not hot to go back.. the meats are WAAY to salty for my taste . Lamb chops are good everything else I couldn't choke down.. salad bar is lovely I did wish they had more veggies tho.. for me not worth the price

URTcLWrFBPNfsotg_3Qkxw.text: Felt like I was back in briefly Brazil.   Authentic tasting Brazilian food at a decent price.   I don't know why we waited so long to try it.  Everything was excellent!

fRLZWZM-oaT-PHSa0y7T5w.text: Fist time here. Wanted to ezperience. Omg so good. Must try everything, leave plenty of room for meat. Waiters and waitresses over the top nice and helpful. Love the outfit/uniform of meat servers. Cant wait to go again

CwNp38lKYCZ9nMGCIp_gFQ.text: My go to place when I want to bring family, friends, or if I want to impress someone. Definetly come here when you are super hungry.

698Gjs3tfwXHt_MUUtq6ew.text: This place is really good l. Service is certainly excellent. You can get the salad bar or salad bar with meats. Ive had both. The salad bar alone is good enough but if your into meat you definetly will not be disappointed here.

5NF74QM-viXECGTwekWFxQ.text: Great food!  Great service!  Just wish I could eat as much as I used to in my twenties!

4LHXNHZ7Gp6KvRBh4IAt3Q.text: Ate dinner with relative and friends. Free parking in mall lot. Offerings of meat on large skewers: house sirloin, lamb chops, filet mignon wrapped in bacon, leg of lamb, flank steak, chicken, ribs, and other meats which I overlooked. Large salad bar and lobster bisque soup. Fried banana and bacon mashed potato was served with meal. Dark environment. I thought most of the meats here were very salty. Soup was good. Eaten at other Brazilian meat restaurants and their meats were less salty and more flavorfully spice. Lime flavored lamb chop was good. Filet mignon was tender. Flank and sirloin were tough. Dessert creme brulee and cheese cake were good if you you did not over eat the meats.

photos.caption: Photo of Texas de Brazil - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Creme Brulee orange sugar crust
Photo of Texas de Brazil - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Dark environment view of soup and salad bar
Photo of Texas de Brazil - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mash potato and fried banana with meal

PuX2U8l_ntq8uY_uidiXtQ.text: I had no idea what I was missing out on my whole life... This place is the best!. I am not really a meat eater so I was unsure about going to such a place but let me tell you even if you don't care for red meat they have so many options. The salad bar has enough delicious food to fill you up by itself and then those cheese bread things omg are soooo good. I t is pricey but worth EVERY penny! The service is really good too! I am looking for an excuse to go back already!
